actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish an equal and equitable classification and duty rates for various cordage products of virtually identical characteristics.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to revise the definition of "cordage" to include cordage made from any size strip of plastic or other man-made material, thereby eliminating different duty rates for varying sizes of plastic or man-made cordage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish an equal and equitable classification and duty rates for various cordage products of virtually identical characteristics.
